headline: Arabic Linguist at LIS-Solutions
summary: Demonstrated high levels of integrity in all aspects of my duties within those organizations I've been involved with.  Worked directly for the commanders and senior staff.  my duties included direct interpretation between the US. Soldiers and local Iraqis , interrogating insurgent detainees in some of the most contested parts of Baghdad and surrounding areas.
